long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-click jump to next AI generated key segment

Benefits
‚ö°Ô∏è Efficient browsing through long YouTube videos
‚ö°Ô∏è Time-saving alternative to fast-forwarding and rewinding
‚ö°Ô∏è Quick assessment and understanding of video content
‚ö°Ô∏è No subscription fees and no hidden costs. AI processing uses your personal OpenAI account

‚è©Ô∏è SpeedClip is a revolutionary tool that allows you to efficiently browse through long YouTube videos. Using AI technology, SpeedClip automatically highlights key segments of the video on the timeline, saving you the hassle of fast-forwarding (and then overshooting) and rewinding.

üñ± With just one click, you can jump to the next key segment, and a summary of that segment will be displayed directly on the video, helping you quickly assess and understand the content.

üí°How it works?
Using AI, SpeedClip identifies key segments of YouTube videos based on the video's subtitles. With just a single click of the mouse, you can quickly browse through the highlighted segments of the video.

üîë After installation, simply click on the link on the page to obtain your OpenAI API key and paste it into SpeedClip's settings page to complete the setup.

üî§ Due to technical limitations, SpeedClip currently does not support YouTube videos without subtitles.
